annotations.description: Sergiy Rybalka (Dynamo Kyiv) unleashed a monstrous piledriver. He controlled a pass, glanced up at goal and shot from the edge of the box. It could have been a difficult one for the keeper, but the ball fortunately hit one of the defenders and ball bounced away. The ball goes out of play and Dyn. Kyiv have been awarded a corner kick.
